member.name: M:OpenTelemetry.Contrib.Extensions.AWSXRay.AWSXRayEventSource.ToInvariantString(System.Exception)
member.summary: Returns a culture-independent string representation of the given object, appropriate for diagnostics tracing.

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Contrib.Extensions.AWSXRay.AWSXRayIdGenerator
member.summary: Generate AWS X-Ray compatible trace id and replace the trace id of root activity. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/xray/latest/devguide/xray-api-sendingdata.html#xray-api-traceids.

member.name: M:OpenTelemetry.Contrib.Extensions.AWSXRay.AWSXRayIdGenerator.ToUnixTimeSeconds(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Convert a given time to Unix time which is the number of seconds since 1st January 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.
member.returns: The number of seconds elapsed since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. The value is expressed in whole and fractional seconds with resolution of microsecond.

member.name: M:OpenTelemetry.Contrib.Extensions.AWSXRay.AWSXRayIdGenerator.NextBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Fills the elements of a specified array of bytes with random numbers.
member.param: An array of bytes to contain random numbers.

member.name: M:OpenTelemetry.Contrib.Extensions.AWSXRay.AWSXRayIdGenerator.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a non-negative random integer that is less than the specified maximum.
member.param: Max value of the random integer.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer that is greater than or equal to 0, and less than maxValue.

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Trace.TracerProviderBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Extension method to generate AWS X-Ray compatible trace id and replace the trace id of root activity.

member.name: M:OpenTelemetry.Trace.TracerProviderBuilderExtensions.AddXRayTraceId(OpenTelemetry.Trace.TracerProviderBuilder)
member.summary: Replace the trace id of root activity.

member.name: M:OpenTelemetry.Trace.TracerProviderBuilderExtensions.AddXRayTraceIdWithSampler(OpenTelemetry.Trace.TracerProviderBuilder,OpenTelemetry.Trace.Sampler)
member.summary: 1. Replace the trace id of root activity. 2. Update the sampling decision for root activity when it's created through ActivitySource.StartActivity().
